title: US is reopening its borders to Europe, the global epicenter of Covid-19
content:
1. US is reopening its borders to Europe, the global epicenter of Covid-19  CNN
  2. An emotional return to New York: What it was like on the first British Airways flight to the US on reopening day  The Points Guy
  3. British Airways & Virgin Atlantic A350s Perform Heathrow Dual Runway Takeoff  One Mile at a Time
  4. Heathrow Airport: Thousands of people share excitement of flying to US for first time since 2020  Berkshire Live
  5. With Tears, Hugs and Balloons, US Allows Vaccinated Foreign Travelers to Enter  The New York Times

localize.title: 米国は、Covid-19の世界的な震源地であるヨーロッパへの国境を再開する。
美国正在重新开放其与欧洲的边界，这是全球Covid-19的中心。
美國正在重新開放其與歐洲的邊界，這是全球Covid-19的中心。
